materials.raw_text:
Lithium (Li): 15.6 g 
 Antimony (Sb): 1.3 g 
 Silicon (Si): 58.1 g

sourcing.instructions:
Lithium: Obtain from chemical supply companies or online chemical retailers. 
 Antimony: Available from metal suppliers or online marketplaces. 
 Silicon: Purchase from silicon suppliers or electronic component suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 15.6 g of lithium, 1.3 g of antimony, and 58.1 g of silicon using an analytical balance. 
 2. In a glove box (to avoid moisture), combine all materials in a clean, dry container. 
 3. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until a homogeneous mixture is achieved.

steps: 1. Use a diamond saw to cut the solidified sample to the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
2. Sand the edges with 400-grit sandpaper to smooth out any rough surfaces.
3. Optionally, apply a protective sealant if the material will be exposed to moisture or air.
